Html:
Hello! Would like to automatically print a number in a cell which is then treated as text.

"Spend in a cell a number as text or preceded by an apostrophe."

The following attempt failed: (

Thanks for your help!

Christopher and sorry for my englisch

1:::
$objPHPExcel->setActiveSheetIndex(0)->setCellValue("F2", "'$res[9]", PHPExcel_Cell_DataType::TYPE_STRING);

2:::
$objPHPExcel->setActiveSheetIndex(0)->setCellValue("F2", $res[9], PHPExcel_Cell_DataType::TYPE_STRING);

3:::
$objPHPExcel->setActiveSheetIndex(0)->setCellValue("F2", '$res[9]', PHPExcel_Cell_DataType::TYPE_STRING);
